name: MagS
short_description: When used together with a Serial Port Magnetic Stripe Card Encoder, MagS allows you to identify, analyze, modify or erase information stored on Magnetic Stripes in Credit Cards, Hotel room key cards and generic points cards (video games, airmiles,etc).
